import React, { useState } from 'react' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' import { useHistory, useParams } from 'react-router-dom' const EditProduct = ({ products, onEdit }) => { let history = useHistory(); let { id } = useParams(); const product = products.find(product => product.id == id); const [valueInput, setValueInput] = useState({}); function onHandleChange(e) { const { name, image, price, Desc, value } = e.target; setValueInput({ ...valueInput, [name]: e.target.value, [image]: e.target.value, [price]: e.target.value, [Desc]: e.target.value, }) } function onSubmit() { onEdit(valueInput); history.push("/admin/products"); } return (
